page.title: 09MOBILE SERVICES IN BACK
page.content: {GROCERY VANS Milk is delivered every day except Sunday, while two vans carry general provisions - as well as news and gossip ! There are also two weekly butchers and a weekly bread van and fish van. {LIBRARY/PLAYBUS A mobile library visits the area every three weeks.A playbus sometimes visits for use by pre-school children. {TWEED Many locals are weavers of Harris Tweed.A van delivers wool to be woven, and returns to collect the finished tweed when it is ready. {BANK Once a month a mobile bank visits the area.
